name: SMARTHOMEbyhornbach
0:
”Alexa, set bathroom to seventy three degrees”
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, start Good Night scene”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this smart home Skill to control your SMART HOME by hornbach connected devices via the Alexa App or via speech input on an Alexa-enabled speaker.
You can also use Alexa Routines and Scenes to automate multiple actions with one speech input or use a motion sensor and contact sensor to trigger Routines. Check out Alexa Routines to find out about all possibilities for your smart devices.

To use this Skill you need:
- SMART HOME by hornbach account with a Home that already has connected devices that support voice control (e.g. plugs, light, roller shutters, thermostats, dimmer, switches, ...)
- Alexa account and Alexa speaker for the voice service (e.g. Smartphone, Amazon Echo)
- Internet connection
